article_title: Medicaid expansion a ‘ruse’ to fund big-city hospitals, would create 'entitlement class,' Brownback aide claims
article_text:
Brownback spokeswoman claims moral, fiscal objection to expanding health coverage for working poor

At least one rural Kansas hospital is closing in October, blaming reduced payments for charity care

Email may accelerate debate over providing health coverage in the state

article_metadata.description: A new email from a spokeswoman for Kansas Gov. Sam Brownback claims expanding Medicaid in the state would do nothing to help rural hospitals, like the one in Independence, Kan., that is now set to close.
article_metadata.title: Medicaid expansion a ‘ruse’ to fund big-city hospitals, would create 'entitlement class,' Brownback aide claims | The Kansas City Star
